ta4
HSK 6: 踏,拓,蹋
Freq: 8545

蹹字的基本解释

蹹
tà
古同“踏”。

蹹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tà］
［《廣韻》他合切，入合，透。］
亦作“蹋1”。亦作“蹹1”。亦作“躢1”。
(1)踩；践踏。
(2)歌舞时以脚踏地为节拍。
(3)趿拉；穿着（鞋）。
(4)迈步；跨。
(5)引申为达到。
(6)游赏。
(7)跟随。
(8)引申为遵循。
(9)实地查勘；察看。
(10)踢。
(11)拖。
(12)贴紧；紧靠。参见“踏水”、“踏壁”。
(13)借指踩踏用的器物如地毯、鞋、靴、脚凳（搁脚用的矮几）等。
(14)象声词。走路声。
(15)通“”。参见“踏飧”。
[②]［tā］
见“踏2心”、“踏2實”。

蹹字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　蹹； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1234第04
【廣韻】徒合切【集韻】達合切，?音踏。齧蹹。【干祿字書】通作蹋。【左傳·宣十二年註】如今軍行，前有斥?蹹伏。【疏】令人遠在軍前斥度?望，慮有伏兵，使蹹行之。

蹹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蹹字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Slap
tà
Gu Tong "stepped".
Slap
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tà］
["Guangyun" he is close, close and thorough. ]
Also referred to as "蹋1". Also known as "Jiao 1". Also known as "躢1".
(1) Trample; trample.
(2) When singing and dancing, step on the ground as the beat.
(3) Zhuo pull; wear (shoes).
(4) Take a step; cross.
(5) The extension is achieved.
(6) Touring.
(7) Follow.
(8) Extended to follow.
(9) Field survey; inspection.
(10) Kick.
(11) Drag.
(12) Close to; close to. See "walking on the water", "walking on the wall".
(13) By means of the utensils used for stepping, such as carpets, shoes, boots, and footstools (low tables for resting feet), etc.
(14) Onomatopoeia. The sound of walking.
(15) Through "". See "Treadmill".
[②]［tā］
See "Step 2 Heart" and "Step 2 Solid".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Foot Character Department】　蹹; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1234 Page 04
[Guang Yun] Only fit and cut [Ji Yun] reach fit and cut, sound pedal. Bite. 【The Book of Dry Lu Characters】Through all of them. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Twelve Years Note] Nowadays, in the army, there are reprimands? 【Sparse】It makes people scold him far from the army, and worry about ambushes, making them rush.
